meanings.sent1: The bombyx spun a cocoon to transform into a moth.
meanings.sent2: The bombyx caterpillar weaves silk to create its cocoon.
meanings.sent3: Why did the bombyx attend a silk-making class? To improve its skills!
meanings.sent4: The bombyx's silk threads are like delicate strands of gold.
meanings.sent5: The bombyx's ability to produce silk is truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: The silk produced by the bombyx moth
meanings.sent1: The shimmering bombyx silk caught the light beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Many people admire the quality of bombyx silk for its softness.
meanings.sent3: The bombyx silk whispered secrets of elegance and luxury.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed like liquid silver, woven from bombyx silk.
meanings.sent5: The touch of bombyx silk against her skin was pure bliss.

meanings.definition: A type of silk fabric made from the fibers of the bombyx moth
meanings.sent1: She wore a stunning gown made of bombyx fabric to the ball.
meanings.sent2: The bombyx fabric was so smooth and luxurious to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The bombyx fabric shimmered under the moonlight, enchanting all who saw it.
meanings.sent4: Her curtains were made of bombyx fabric, adding elegance to the room.
meanings.sent5: The bombyx fabric draped gracefully, enhancing the beauty of the room.

meanings.definition: The larvae of the bombyx moth, used in silk production
meanings.sent1: The bombyx larvae munch on mulberry leaves before spinning their cocoons.
meanings.sent2: Silk farmers carefully nurture the bombyx larvae for their silk production.
meanings.sent3: The bombyx larvae had a race to see who could spin the fastest cocoon!
meanings.sent4: The bombyx larvae worked tirelessly, weaving silk for the world to enjoy.
meanings.sent5: The bombyx larvae's silk-making journey is a fascinating process to witness.
